segwit_addr¶

Reference implementation for Bech32 and segwit addresses.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_create_checksum(hrp, data)¶

Compute the checksum values given HRP and data.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_decode(bech)¶

Validate a Bech32 string, and determine HRP and data.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_encode(hrp, data)¶

Compute a Bech32 string given HRP and data values.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_hrp_expand(hrp)¶

Expand the HRP into values for checksum computation.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_polymod(values)¶

Internal function that computes the Bech32 checksum.

util.segwit_addr.bech32_verify_checksum(hrp, data)¶

Verify a checksum given HRP and converted data characters.

util.segwit_addr.decode(hrp, addr)¶

Decode a segwit address.

util.segwit_addr.encode(hrp, witver, witprog)¶

Encode a segwit address.
